price: 92. Bokozwa bolamu te kino bokobimisa ya malamu okati ya maye bolingaka. Mpe na nyoso oyo bobimisaka, ya sôló Allah ayebi yango.
arabic: لَن تَنَالُواْ ٱلۡبِرَّ حَتَّىٰ تُنفِقُواْ مِمَّا تُحِبُّونَۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُواْ مِن شَيۡءٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِهِۦ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lan tanālū al-bira ḥattā tunfiqū mimmā tuḥibbūna wamā tunfiqū min shayin fa-inna al-laha bihi ʿalīmun
